key.name: delay
key.description: The delay in minutes between wallpaper changes.

key.name: random
key.summary: Whether to randomize the list or not.
key.description: If set to true, the order of the wallpaper-list will be random.

key.name: image-list
key.description: An Array of absolute, unix-styled path's to the wallpapers.

key.name: elapsed-time
key.summary: Minutes elapsed from the last delay.
key.description: The minutes already elapsed from the last delay-interval.

key.name: change-lockscreen
key.summary: Whether to change the lockscreen wallpaper or not.
key.description: If set to true, the lockscreen wallpaper will be changed.
